title: The New Mother
description: A reporter investigates a new disease spreading across the world, with personal stakes in the outcome.Winner of the James Tiptree, Jr. Literary AwardSecond place winner of the Theodore Sturgeon Memorial AwardNominated for the Nebula AwardFinalist for the Asimov’s Readers’ AwardLonglisted for the Hugo AwardLocus magazine Recommended Novella
author: Eugene Fischer
